localised_action_description.last_approved_text: Obstruct the faction's trade efforts, thereby diminishing their trade power.

agent_actions.localised_action_description: Obstruct the faction's trade efforts, thereby diminishing their trade power.

localised_action_description.last_approved_text: Dispatch false marching orders to an army, thereby diminishing its range and causing the troops to be fatigued in battle.

agent_actions.localised_action_description: Dispatch false marching orders to an army, thereby diminishing its range and causing the troops to be fatigued in battle.

localised_action_description.last_approved_text: Prevent supplies from reaching an army, thereby hindering replenishment of units.

agent_actions.localised_action_description: Prevent supplies from reaching an army, thereby hindering replenishment of units.

localised_action_description.last_approved_text: Arrange for an army's provisions to be poisoned, thereby inflicting casualties upon its units.

agent_actions.localised_action_description: Arrange for an army's provisions to be poisoned, thereby inflicting casualties upon its units.

localised_action_description.last_approved_text: Turn direct command of this spy's retinue over to you, forcing any other generals to be recalled and granting you a new active army in the field.

agent_actions.localised_action_description: Turn direct command of this spy's retinue over to you, forcing any other generals to be recalled and granting you a new active army in the field.

localised_action_description.last_approved_text: Leak an army's planned manoeuvres, thereby allowing forces to engage them in night battles regardless of circumstance and increasing their chance of being ambushed.

agent_actions.localised_action_description: Leak an army's planned manoeuvres, thereby allowing forces to engage them in night battles regardless of circumstance and increasing their chance of being ambushed.

localised_action_description.last_approved_text: Arrange for a loyal member of your undercover network to infiltrate a known character's army, thereby granting you its line-of-sight and allowing you to track its manoeuvres.

agent_actions.localised_action_description: Arrange for a loyal member of your undercover network to infiltrate a known character's army, thereby granting you its line-of-sight and allowing you to track its manoeuvres.

localised_action_description.last_approved_text: Set a plot to assassinate the faction heir in motion.

agent_actions.localised_action_description: Set a plot to assassinate the faction heir in motion.

localised_action_description.last_approved_text: Set a plot to assassinate the faction leader in motion.

agent_actions.localised_action_description: Set a plot to assassinate the faction leader in motion.

localised_action_description.last_approved_text: Incite a malcontent to spread untoward rumours about the faction, thereby slightly diminishing satisfaction throughout the court.

agent_actions.localised_action_description: Incite a malcontent to spread untoward rumours about the faction, thereby slightly diminishing satisfaction throughout the court.

localised_action_description.last_approved_text: Spread malicious rumours about a character, thereby significantly diminishing their satisfaction within the court.

agent_actions.localised_action_description: Spread malicious rumours about a character, thereby significantly diminishing their satisfaction within the court.

localised_action_description.last_approved_text: Meddle in the faction's intelligence efforts, thereby diminishing their counter spying attempts and increasing your spy's cover.

agent_actions.localised_action_description: Meddle in the faction's intelligence efforts, thereby diminishing their counter spying attempts and increasing your spy's cover.

localised_action_description.last_approved_text: Manipulate the faction's trade efforts, thereby increasing your own trade power.

agent_actions.localised_action_description: Manipulate the faction's trade efforts, thereby increasing your own trade power.

localised_action_description.last_approved_text: Vocally support your faction within the court, thereby improving diplomatic relations.

agent_actions.localised_action_description: Vocally support your faction within the court, thereby improving diplomatic relations.

localised_action_description.last_approved_text: Attempt to manipulate the spy into being granted administrative powers over a commandery.\n\nNote that this depends on the target faction's need for administrators and does not guarantee an administrative appointment!

agent_actions.localised_action_description: Attempt to manipulate the spy into being granted administrative powers over a commandery.\n\nNote that this depends on the target faction's need for administrators and does not guarantee an administrative appointment!

localised_action_description.last_approved_text: Attempt to manipulate the spy into being sent into the field as a general.\n\nNote that this depends on the target faction's need for generals and does not guarantee a military appointment!

agent_actions.localised_action_description: Attempt to manipulate the spy into being sent into the field as a general.\n\nNote that this depends on the target faction's need for generals and does not guarantee a military appointment!

localised_action_description.last_approved_text: Steal a random item from the faction before escaping with it back to your own.

agent_actions.localised_action_description: Steal a random item from the faction before escaping with it back to your own.

localised_action_description.last_approved_text: Trigger a civil war between those most loyal to the spy and those less satisfied with their rule, strongly reinforcing your influence over the faction in the process.

agent_actions.localised_action_description: Trigger a civil war between those most loyal to the spy and those less satisfied with their rule, strongly reinforcing your influence over the faction in the process.

localised_action_description.last_approved_text: Open the settlement's gates, thereby leaving it open to attack.

localised_action_description.last_approved_text: Acquire additional covert relations and assets within the faction, thereby allowing you to bolster your undercover network overall.

localised_action_description.last_approved_text: Attempt to manipulate the spy into being granted one of the faction offices.\n\nNote that this depends on the availability of ministerial positions within the target faction and does not guarantee a military appointment!
